definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Why are GM foods potentially allergenic?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼轉基因食物可能會引起過敏？

sentences.english: Q12. Have GM products on the international market passed a risk assessment?
sentences.chinese: 國際市場上的轉基因產品是否已通過風險評估？

sentences.english: Transgenic plant as plant-derived vaccine is prospect in the production of FMD vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 利用轉基因植物生產植物源性的口蹄疫疫苗前景廣闊。

sentences.english: The OSM transgenic retinal cells underwent apoptosis indicated by TUNEL assays.
sentences.chinese: TUNEL試驗顯示轉基因鼠視網膜細胞凋亡。

sentences.english: GMO foods do not have to be labeled in America.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，轉基因食品毋須用籤條標明。

sentences.english: The study concludes that GM herbicide-resistant soybeans have not increased yields.
sentences.chinese: 該項研究結論，轉基因抗除草劑大豆並沒有增加產量。

sentences.english: Transgenic tobacco young seedings are obtained in taking root culture medium .
sentences.chinese: 轉基因菸草在生根培養基中獲得了菸草小苗。

sentences.english: Critics of transgenic foods say this is ridiculous.
sentences.chinese: 轉基因食品的批評者認爲這很可笑。

sentences.english: The supply of non-GM crops is also dwindling, which is forcing prices higher.
sentences.chinese: 非轉基因作物的供應也在減少，這促使價格升高。

sentences.english: The transgenic canola plants are not about to take over the world.
sentences.chinese: 轉基因油菜作物不可能將一統天下。

sentences.english: Feeding transgenic Synechocystis did not induce the formation of micronucleus and other nuclear abnormalities in erythrocyte.
sentences.chinese: 轉基因集胞藻對紅細胞微核及核異常沒有誘導作用。

sentences.english: Manure from genetically modified animals is not certifiable.
sentences.chinese: 轉基因動物來源肥料不可被認證。

sentences.english: Microinjection is a key method to animal gene transfer.
sentences.chinese: 注射法是當今構建轉基因動物模型的主要方法。

sentences.english: Genetically-modified (GM) food is one of the most significant applications.
sentences.chinese: 轉基因食品是生物技術領域的重要應用之一。

sentences.english: But the rice is genetically engineered.
sentences.chinese: 但黃金米是轉基因大米。

definition: to cross the limit/to be over the accepted norm/excessive
to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
